Calculate ICIQ-UI SF (International Consultation on Incontinence Questionnaire-Urinary Incontinence Short Form) Scores

Source: R/calculate_iciq_ui_sf.R
calculate_iciq_ui_sf.Rd

Calculates scores for the ICIQ-UI SF, a validated instrument measuring urinary incontinence symptoms and their impact on quality of life. The function includes robust validation, handles missing data according to scoring guidelines, and provides detailed analysis of incontinence situations.

Usage

calculate_iciq_ui_sf(
  questionnaire_data,
  id_column = NULL,
  frequency_item = "iciq_1",
  volume_item = "iciq_2",
  impact_item = "iciq_3",
  situation_prefix = "iciq_4_",
  calculate_situations = TRUE,
  missing_threshold = 0,
  verbose = FALSE
)

Arguments

questionnaire_data

A data frame containing ICIQ-UI SF item responses. Column names should follow the pattern specified by the parameters or default structure.

id_column

Character string specifying the column name containing patient identifiers. If NULL (default), no ID column is used.

frequency_item

Character string specifying the column name containing the frequency question (item 1). Default is "iciq_1".

volume_item

Character string specifying the column name containing the leakage amount question (item 2). Default is "iciq_2".

impact_item

Character string specifying the column name containing the quality of life impact question (item 3). Default is "iciq_3".

situation_prefix

Character string specifying the prefix for situation columns (item 4). Default is "iciq_4_".

calculate_situations

Logical indicating whether to analyze incontinence situations. Default is TRUE.

missing_threshold

Numeric value between 0 and 1 specifying the maximum proportion of missing values allowed for the core items (1-3). Default is 0.0 (no missing values allowed).

verbose

Logical indicating whether to display detailed logging information. Default is FALSE.

Value

A data frame containing the original data plus additional columns:

  • iciq_score: The ICIQ-UI SF total score (sum of items 1-3), ranging from 0-21, with higher scores indicating greater severity.

  • frequency_score: Score for urinary frequency (item 1, 0-5).

  • volume_score: Score for leakage amount (item 2, 0-6).

  • impact_score: Score for quality of life impact (item 3, 0-10).

  • iciq_missing: Count of missing core items (1-3).

  • iciq_valid: Logical indicating if the score is valid.

  • situation_*: If calculate_situations=TRUE, columns for each incontinence situation.

Details

The ICIQ-UI SF consists of 4 items:

  • Item 1: Frequency of urinary leakage (scored 0-5)

  • Item 2: Amount of leakage (scored 0-6)

  • Item 3: Impact on quality of life (scored 0-10)

  • Item 4: Situations when leakage occurs (not scored, diagnostic only)

The total ICIQ-UI SF score is the sum of items 1-3, ranging from 0-21:

  • 1-5: Mild urinary incontinence

  • 6-12: Moderate urinary incontinence

  • 13-21: Severe urinary incontinence

Missing data handling:

  • By default, if any items 1-3 are missing, the score is set to NA

  • This can be customized with the missing_threshold parameter

  • Missing situation items (item 4) are treated as "not selected"

References

Avery K, Donovan J, Peters TJ, Shaw C, Gotoh M, Abrams P (2004). ICIQ: a brief and robust measure for evaluating the symptoms and impact of urinary incontinence. Neurourology and Urodynamics, 23(4), 322-330.

Examples

# Example 1: Basic usage with minimal data
iciq_data <- data.frame(
  patient_id = c("P001", "P002", "P003"),
  iciq_1 = c(2, 3, 1),     # Frequency (0-5)
  iciq_2 = c(4, 2, 0),     # Volume (0-6)
  iciq_3 = c(6, 8, 3),     # Impact (0-10)
  iciq_4_1 = c(1, 0, 0),   # Situation: leaks before reaching toilet
  iciq_4_2 = c(0, 1, 0),   # Situation: leaks when coughing/sneezing
  iciq_4_3 = c(0, 0, 1),   # Situation: leaks when asleep
  iciq_4_4 = c(0, 1, 0),   # Situation: leaks with physical activity
  iciq_4_5 = c(1, 0, 0),   # Situation: leaks when finished urinating
  iciq_4_6 = c(0, 0, 0),   # Situation: leaks for no obvious reason
  iciq_4_7 = c(0, 0, 0)    # Situation: leaks all the time
)

iciq_results <- calculate_iciq_ui_sf(
  questionnaire_data = iciq_data,
  id_column = "patient_id",
  verbose = TRUE
)
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Verbose logging enabled
#> INFO [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Starting ICIQ-UI SF calculation
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Input parameters: id_column = %spatient_id
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Item columns: frequency = %s, volume = %s, impact = %siciq_1iciq_2iciq_3
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Situation prefix: %s, calculate_situations = %siciq_4_TRUE
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Missing threshold: %.2f0
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Validating input data
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Input validation completed
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Extracting ID column: %spatient_id
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Extracting core ICIQ-UI SF items
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Extracted %d core items3
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Processing data types for ICIQ-UI SF items
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Data type processing completed
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Calculating ICIQ-UI SF scores
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Maximum allowed missing items: %d out of %d03
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] %d out of %d rows have valid ICIQ-UI SF data33
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Total ICIQ-UI SF scores range from %.1f to %.1f413
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] ICIQ-UI SF score calculation completed
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Extracting and processing situation data
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Found %d situation columns7
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Converted column %s to logicaliciq_4_1
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Converted column %s to logicaliciq_4_2
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Converted column %s to logicaliciq_4_3
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Converted column %s to logicaliciq_4_4
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Converted column %s to logicaliciq_4_5
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Converted column %s to logicaliciq_4_6
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Converted column %s to logicaliciq_4_7
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Situation data processing completed
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Combining score data with situation data
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Combining results into final output
#> INFO [2025-03-29 03:51:43] ICIQ-UI SF calculation completed successfully
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Final result dimensions: %d rows, %d columns314
print(iciq_results)
#>   patient_id frequency_score volume_score impact_score iciq_score iciq_missing
#> 1       P001               2            4            6         12            0
#> 2       P002               3            2            8         13            0
#> 3       P003               1            0            3          4            0
#>   iciq_valid situation_before_toilet situation_cough_sneeze situation_asleep
#> 1       TRUE                    TRUE                  FALSE            FALSE
#> 2       TRUE                   FALSE                   TRUE            FALSE
#> 3       TRUE                   FALSE                  FALSE             TRUE
#>   situation_physical situation_after_urinating situation_no_reason
#> 1              FALSE                      TRUE               FALSE
#> 2               TRUE                     FALSE               FALSE
#> 3              FALSE                     FALSE               FALSE
#>   situation_all_time
#> 1              FALSE
#> 2              FALSE
#> 3              FALSE

# Example 2: With data containing missing values
iciq_data_missing <- data.frame(
  patient_id = c("P001", "P002", "P003"),
  iciq_1 = c(2, NA, 1),    # Frequency (0-5)
  iciq_2 = c(4, 2, 0),     # Volume (0-6)
  iciq_3 = c(6, 8, NA),    # Impact (0-10)
  iciq_4_1 = c(1, 0, 0),   # Situation: leaks before reaching toilet
  iciq_4_2 = c(0, 1, 0),   # Situation: leaks when coughing/sneezing
  iciq_4_3 = c(0, NA, 1)   # Situation: leaks when asleep
)

iciq_results_missing <- calculate_iciq_ui_sf(
  questionnaire_data = iciq_data_missing,
  id_column = "patient_id",
  missing_threshold = 0.33,  # Allow up to 33% missing items
  verbose = TRUE
)
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Verbose logging enabled
#> INFO [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Starting ICIQ-UI SF calculation
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Input parameters: id_column = %spatient_id
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Item columns: frequency = %s, volume = %s, impact = %siciq_1iciq_2iciq_3
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Situation prefix: %s, calculate_situations = %siciq_4_TRUE
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Missing threshold: %.2f0.33
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Validating input data
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Input validation completed
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Extracting ID column: %spatient_id
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Extracting core ICIQ-UI SF items
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Extracted %d core items3
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Processing data types for ICIQ-UI SF items
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Data type processing completed
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Calculating ICIQ-UI SF scores
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Maximum allowed missing items: %d out of %d03
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] %d out of %d rows have valid ICIQ-UI SF data13
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Total ICIQ-UI SF scores range from %.1f to %.1f1212
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] ICIQ-UI SF score calculation completed
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Extracting and processing situation data
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Found %d situation columns3
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Converted column %s to logicaliciq_4_1
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Converted column %s to logicaliciq_4_2
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Converted column %s to logicaliciq_4_3
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Situation data processing completed
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Combining score data with situation data
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Combining results into final output
#> INFO [2025-03-29 03:51:43] ICIQ-UI SF calculation completed successfully
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Final result dimensions: %d rows, %d columns310
print(iciq_results_missing)
#>   patient_id frequency_score volume_score impact_score iciq_score iciq_missing
#> 1       P001               2            4            6         12            0
#> 2       P002              NA            2            8         NA            1
#> 3       P003               1            0           NA         NA            1
#>   iciq_valid situation_before_toilet situation_cough_sneeze situation_asleep
#> 1       TRUE                    TRUE                  FALSE            FALSE
#> 2      FALSE                   FALSE                   TRUE            FALSE
#> 3      FALSE                   FALSE                  FALSE             TRUE

# Example 3: With alternative column naming convention
alt_iciq_data <- data.frame(
  record_id = c("R1", "R2", "R3"),
  frequency = c(2, 3, 1),      # Frequency (0-5)
  amount = c(4, 2, 0),         # Volume (0-6)
  qol_impact = c(6, 8, 3),     # Impact (0-10)
  sit_toilet = c(1, 0, 0),     # Situation: before reaching toilet
  sit_cough = c(0, 1, 0),      # Situation: when coughing/sneezing
  sit_sleep = c(0, 0, 1)       # Situation: when asleep
)

iciq_results_alt <- calculate_iciq_ui_sf(
  questionnaire_data = alt_iciq_data,
  id_column = "record_id",
  frequency_item = "frequency",
  volume_item = "amount",
  impact_item = "qol_impact",
  situation_prefix = "sit_",
  verbose = TRUE
)
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Verbose logging enabled
#> INFO [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Starting ICIQ-UI SF calculation
#> DEBUG [2025-03-29 03:51:43] Input parameters: id_column = %srecord_id
